ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND ( ISPICKVAL( Tax_Agency__c, "FL - FLORIDA") || ISPICKVAL( Tax_Agency__c, "NV - NEVADA")|| ISPICKVAL( Tax_Agency__c, "TN - TENNESSEE")|| ISPICKVAL( Tax_Agency__c, "TX - TEXAS")|| ISPICKVAL( Tax_Agency__c, "WA - WASHINGTON") || ISPICKVAL( Tax_Agency__c, "NH - NEW HAMPSHIRE")|| ISPICKVAL( Tax_Agency__c, "SD - SOUTH DAKOTA")|| ISPICKVAL( Tax_Agency__c, "AK - ALASKA")|| ISPICKVAL( Tax_Agency__c, "WY - WYOMING"), ISPICKVAL( Tax_Type__c, "State-Withholding"), NOT (ISPICKVAL( Status__c ,"Pending PAC Review - New Notice Received"))
)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Tax Type is Invalid for this Tax Agency
